Package game.actors

Class Player

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Resettable
public class Player
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
implements Resettable
Class representing the Player. It implements the Resettable interface. It carries around a club to attack a hostile creature in the Lands Between. Created by:
Author:
Adrian Kristanto Modified by:
